name: KIPP San Francisco Bay Academy
description: KIPP San Francisco Bay Academy (grades 5-8) is a public charter middle school located in the Western Addition neighborhood. KIPP San Francisco Bay Academy provides students with the knowledge, skills, and character traits needed to succeed in top-quality high schools, colleges, and in the competitive world beyond.
